The CCI Ontology`This work is licensed under a BSD license.`STFC`CCI Ontology`Science and Technology Facilities Council``This ontology represents the Directory Reference Scheme (DRS) used by the ESA Climate Change Initiative CCI project.`

OWL Classes

There are currently 11 classes in the ontology
column2:
each of which represents an entry in the DRS as well a two object properties to link sensors and platforms.
OWL Classes

Concept Schemes

The named individuals of each class are also represented as concepts in SKOS concept schemes: data type
column13: and sensors. The use of a concept scheme allows easy navigation up and down the tree as well as providing relationships to concepts from other DRS. As well as relationships between sensors and platforms
column14:
each ECV concept is related to one or more data type concepts.

SKOS Navigation Down the Concept Scheme
SKOS Navigation Up the Concept Scheme

Collections

The named individuals of each class are also represented as members in SKOS collections: data type
column24: and sensors. As well as relationships between sensors and platforms
column25:
each ECV concept is related to one or more data type concepts.
